meanings.definition: A small evergreen tree or shrub with glossy leaves and white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The myrtle in our garden attracts butterflies with its beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a myrtle in my backyard for some greenery and color.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the myrtle as a hiding spot during the game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the glossy leaves of a myrtle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the myrtle filled the air, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A dark green color resembling the leaves of the myrtle plant.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely myrtle shade to bring nature indoors.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed blue and yellow to create a beautiful myrtle hue for the painting.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer chose a myrtle dress for the runway show, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: The forest was bathed in a myrtle glow as the sun set behind the trees.
meanings.sent5: The myrtle color of the grass after the rain was a refreshing sight.
